programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

Noddy realises what a great friend Revs is to Tractor. He suggests that they have another race for fun and not just to win. This time EVERYONE has fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: BRO&MARBLE in Dubai

programme.title: The Genius Paik

programme.title: The Ways of Tasting
programme.desc: A special program showcasing actresses Lee Ji-ah and Kim Go-eun's trip to famous restaurants and bars in Seoul and Taiwan, pairing whiskey with food.

programme.title: Express Delivery: Mongolia Edition
programme.desc: “Let’s deliver parcels while riding horses!” The “Dragon Zodiac Club” members become delivery men in Mongolia, globe-trotting to deliver parcels from the world only to keep their word!

programme.title: Chef and My Fridge (2024)

programme.title: Husband Swap
programme.desc: Love at the first sight made a young couple get married. However, after their 5-year marriage, the husband began to find ways to make his wife actively break up with him.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 3
programme.desc: A man travels from China to Vietnam, on the brink of war with America, to retrieve his uncle and cousin but finds complications when he falls in love with a female gangster with a dangerous ex

programme.title: City War
programme.desc: Two cops – both partners and best friends – find their friendship and their lives at stake when they try to take down a ruthless drug dealer

programme.title: Tiger On Beat
programme.desc: A drug dealer joins forces with two mismatched cops to crack a band of heroin dealers.

programme.title: Hit-And-Run Squad
programme.desc: A recently demoted police officer teams up with a member of the hit-and-run squad to take down a former pro racer with crooked business interests.

programme.title: Cracked
programme.desc: Ruja inherited the painting from her deceased father and hired Tim, an art restorer to repair it, but they don't know that this invaluable art came with invaluable horror.

programme.title: Stockholm
programme.desc: Based on the absurd but true 1973 bank heist and hostage crisis in Stockholm that was documented in the New Yorker as the origins of the 'Stockholm Syndrome‘, a condition in which hostages develop a psychological bond with their captors.

programme.title: Steel Rain 2: Summit
programme.desc: A general holds the U.S. president and the leaders of North Korea and South Korea hostage on a submarine.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China

programme.title: Kickboxer: Retaliation

programme.title: Selfie From Hell

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: In a frenzy of mezcal and spice, Mena devours a host of local delicacies: plant-based seafood, agua chile and classic enfrijoladas. Later, Mena joins a local abuela to make traditional moles.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy is suspicious when Revs suddenly slows down during a race on the roller coaster in DareDale. He doesn't like to lose and doesn't understand what's happened. Noddy needs to investigate so that they don't lose another race! Using all his investigate skills Noddy follows the clues to the Farm where he finds out that Revs deliberately slowed down so his friend Tractor wouldn't come last as usual. Noddy realises what a great friend Revs is to Tractor. He suggests that they have another race for fun and not just to win. This time EVERYONE has fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must switch identities to track down a heroin thief and save their department.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A pampered actor and his co-stars become part of a real war in a Southeast Asian jungle.

programme.desc: John Cusack stars as an American intelligence official who returns to Shanghai in late 1941 to investigate the death of a friend, which leads him to both love and a much larger conspiracy.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law’s affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.title: CSI S3 E08 - Snuff
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Muling Umawit Ang Puso
programme.desc: A popular singer-actress went into seclusion after the traumatic experience of watching her pregnant sister die in the wake of a stampede of her fans. Nearly twenty years later, she took in a young girl who wanted to be a star and tried to mold her into a copy of what she was before.

programme.title: Jesus Calderon (Maton)
programme.desc: This is another take-off on the eternal poor boy loves rich girl tale. Love wins out in the end but only after Jesus Calderon has proven himself, and the lovely damsel in distress has learned to love and trust him with all her heart.

programme.title: Kahit Konting Pagtingin (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: FPJ teamed up with the Megastar in this enchanting romantic comedy with huge doses of action. A love story of the driver-bodyguard, Delfin and the headstrong, Georgia whom he was able to tame.

programme.title: Oplan: Kidnap Gang
programme.desc: The continuous rise of kidnap-for-ransom cases forces the government to form a task force to stop it. All committed to one goal -- stop the dreaded Lost Command, the most notorious of the kidnap-for-ransom gangs. Expect a lot of explosive firepower and non-stop action.

programme.title: Ang Pinakamagandang Hayop sa Balat ng Lupa 1
programme.desc: Gloria Diaz plays a strange but a beautiful woman who is washed ashore in an island where her presence causes intrigue, jealousy, strife and later on, even a series of deaths.

programme.title: Mana Sa Ina
programme.desc: Fidel (Robert Arevalo) is super-strict with his daughter Frieda (Rita Avila) for fear the girl would take after her harlot of a mother Carolina (Marissa Delgado). Carolina has since abandoned her husband and daughter in favor of her lover Rufino (Orestes Ojeda).

programme.title: Bruce Liit
programme.desc: Bruce (Niño Muhlach) is eager to learn karate specially when he sees his father practice. But Miguel (Ramon Zamora) keeps on postponing his son's instruction deeming Bruce too young to appreciate the principles behind this particular vocation.

programme.title: Pretty Boy Segovia
programme.desc: Pretty Boy Segovia

programme.title: Dear Diary
programme.desc: Two teen stories for one starring talented young actor Herbert Bautista. In one story, he was a houseboy who striked up a friendship with the girl. In the other story, he and his friends played detective.

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Hanggang Dito na Lang
programme.desc: Hilda Koronel discovered that love, fidelity and being a perfect wife and mother were not enough to keep a husband from straying.

programme.title: Narito Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth with David Rubenstein
programme.desc: Renowned financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein talks with the world's most successful investors, who share their investing strategies and tactics.

programme.title: Athlete | Empire: Alex Rodriguez
programme.desc: Former baseball pro Alex Rodriguez quietly built a real estate empire over 20 years. Now, after retiring from baseball, he's accelerating his transformation from former athlete to investor and owner.

programme.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
programme.desc: Roblox CEO & Co-Founder David Baszucki. Bloomberg talks to David Baszucki about the success of the online gaming platform, Roblox.

programme.title: SUSHI TRUTH
programme.desc: Sushi is an iconic dish of Japan, with nigirizushi being the most popular style. We take a look at its evolution and the creation of key ingredients.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: NHK WORLD TV Special program
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Hiroshima. Explore the ravages of war and a call for peace at the Hiroshima Peace Memorial Museum. Join a hunt for new designs born from traditional, regional crafts.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Journey through the tranquil rustic landscape of Shimane Pref. Traditional fishermen catch clams. One temple offers blessing for eye ailments. And, residents make unusual sculptures for the deities.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanese paper, known as washi, is attractively textured and extremely durable. In a 5-minute digest, we explore its role in modern society and examine how it represents Japanese aesthetics.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KANSAI DEEPER
programme.desc: Small octopus balls cooked on grills have engendered a food culture unto their own and are Osaka's leading soul food. Explore the essence of Osaka that prizes tasty, affordable, and satisfying food.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Find out about Japan's emergency food options that meet the needs of various people. Also discover the rolling stock method, a smart way to stockpile emergency food.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Barakan Discovers KUMANO
programme.desc: Minakata Kumagusu, a renowned ecologist, defended the sacred forests of Kumano in the Kii Mountain Range. He saved them from extinction by fighting the government near the start of the 20th century.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Arabian wolves live in the Negev Desert in Israel. How and why do they live in such extreme arid lands? We follow this unique canine for an extended period for the first time ever.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey

programme.title: Barakan Discovers KUMANO

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Train Cruise

programme.desc: The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a burgling buccaneer steals every pillow in Axle City, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to save bedtime! Using his new Special Mission Modes and the power of addition, can Blaze solve this pillow problem?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: The Queen of Reptiles is visiting Isa, but the garden's a mess! Dora helps her get everything ready in time for La Reina's visit. / Dora meets Sammy the Sloth, who needs to get to Day Camp on time so he can show everyone a special surprise.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony. // Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 22
programme.desc: Howard's wedding plans are in jeopardy after the guys (and Wil Wheaton) throw him a bachelor party and details of his sexual history are leaked online.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 23
programme.desc: When NASA reschedules Howard's mission and puts his wedding plans in jeopardy, he's forced to face his fears and Bernadette's dad (guest star CASEY SANDER).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 24
programme.desc: When Howard and Bernadette decide they want to be married before his NASA space launch, the gang rushes to put on a wedding, on the fifth season finale.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys polish their skills as manicurists in an unsuspecting nail salon, get touchy feely with patrons in a comic book store, and race through the aisles of a grocery store.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 5
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys say all the wrong things when conducting sensitivity training, have unexpected celebrity sightings on the street, and are forced into being unreceptive receptionists in a busy office.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 6
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys share shameful secrets in the park, don headsets at a fast food drive-through, and try to convince unsuspecting strangers to dance with them.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 7
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys enlist shoppers to settle senseless debates in the mall, scream for ice-cream as patrons in a parlor, and protest unconventional causes in the park.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 8
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys debut uninspiring inventions to stunned focus groups, use people for pillows as they fall asleep in the park, and talk shoppers out of their desired products in a grocery store.

programme.title: Friends S6 18
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Ross gets into trouble by dating a student. Chandler tries to help Joey's career.

programme.title: Friends S6 19
programme.desc: Ross worries when his student/girlfriend goes on vacation with her wild friends. Rachel needs a date for a ball. Joey's refrigerator breaks down.

programme.title: Friends S6 20
programme.desc: In this episode primarily composed of clips from earlier shows, Joey auditions for a major television role. But Chandler almost ruins everything by forgetting a telephone message.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 17
programme.desc: Why are so many people born on October 5th? What 1950's actress inspired Brooke's Lazy Cook getup? Why are fish sticks banned from offices in Aspen? And when was the first roller coaster made? Get the whole lowdown on Inside Hacks!

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In the future, North America is no more. In its place has risen Panem, a divided nation split into 12 districts. Every year, each district selects a teen of each gender (called "Tributes") to test their worth in a competition known as the Hunger Games. Part entertainment, part brutal retribution for a past rebellion, the televised games are broadcast throughout Panem. The 24 participants are forced to eliminate their competitors while the citizens of Panem are required to watch. When her younger sister is selected as District 12's latest "Tribute," Katniss volunteers to take her place, and trains under hard-drinking former Hunger Games champion Haymitch Abernathy to sharpen her killer instincts. Now in order to survive the game and emerge the victor, this young combatant must put all of her skills to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Caught! (Season 2) S2 1
programme.desc: Many people between the ages of 25 and 45 claim to be do-it-yourselfers, but from chainsaw mishaps to beehive blunders, sometimes it's best to leave it to the pros!

programme.title: Caught! (Season 2) S2 2
programme.desc: Throughout history, humans have dared to be wild by pulling off insane stunts, and risking it all for glory -- in modern times, their goal is those addictive internet likes!

programme.title: Friends S6 21
programme.desc: Ross fails to impress his girlfriend's father. Joey jeopardizes his acting role by insulting a robot. Phoebe writes a book about Monica and Chandler.

programme.title: East New York S1 7
programme.desc: Morales suspects a supermarket shooting has ties to an unsolved assault case she worked years earlier.

programme.title: East New York S1 8
programme.desc: When four party-goers fatally overdose, the 7-4’s investigation is impeded by an ongoing DEA operation, and Haywood asks Suarez for help. Also, Yenko deals with tension at home.

programme.title: East New York S1 9
programme.desc: The 7-4 investigates the suspicious death of a retired cop who was planning to go public with claims of corruption.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 13
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin reveal the ultimate hands-free mower and find hacks for removing carpet stains. Plus, they'll hack a chandelier and learn from pros with Becky's Beauty Hacks and Broke Ass Bob's guide to owning a dog.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 14
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin game the system by testing the most effective hacks for buying a used car-and knocking hundreds of dollars off in the process! Plus, the newest Hack Master reveals a mind-blowing technique for taking out the trash.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 15
programme.desc: Dr. Hack is back with tips for treating medical maladies. Plus, Broke Ass Bob hacks moving in together, Kevin tests a homemade tanning blend, and Brooke reveals the Lazy Cook's latest endeavor: homemade microwaved potato chips.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 16
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test hacks for getting free parking, and Kevin finds the best hack for peeling eggs. Plus, Brooke combats shrinking sweaters, and Pitch Man shares the best hacks for cooking like a pro.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 17
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test the best hacks for beating a motion detector. Plus, secrets for hacking French manicures and beach hair, keeping your dog off the lawn, and making a frittata out of leftover pizza are revealed.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 18
programme.desc: Dr. Hack is back with the most unexpected ways to cure burns, toothaches, and migraines. Plus, Kevin and Brooke test the best hacks for maintaining rock star hair, cooking an omelet in a bag, and gaming the carnival system.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 19
programme.desc: Hack Nanny returns with the best parenting tips and tricks, and Broke Ass Bob figures out how to hack his own day spa. Plus, Brooke hacks homemade pizza bites, and Kevin drinks juice without taking it out of the fridge.

programme.title: Arrow S2 8
programme.desc: With a mysterious Vertigo-related illness sweeping the city (and both Diggle and Felicity in danger) Oliver must choose between stopping the Count or standing by his family.

programme.title: Arrow S2 9
programme.desc: After a seemingly impossible robbery at Queen Consolidated, Central City's police scientist Barry Allen (GRANT GUSTIN) offers to help Oliver and his team.

programme.title: Arrow S2 10
programme.desc: After a fight with Cyrus Gold (aka the Acolyte), Oliver is drugged and left for dead. Determined to save him, Felicity's cure causes Oliver to hallucinate, and confront his past.

programme.title: Arrow S2 11
programme.desc: Oliver confronts a new threat when bombs start to go off in Starling City...planted by a man named Shrapnel, who's next targeting Sebastian Blood's Unity Rally.

programme.title: Arrow S2 12
programme.desc: When Laurel asks the Arrow to investigate Sebastian Blood, Oliver is unsure whether to believe her accusations. But when they get too close to the truth, Blood strikes back.

programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 123
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: Election Night Coverage
programme.desc: Election Night Coverage

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin - Episode 3
programme.desc: Jay struggles with findings about Jack's death. He looks for clues pointing to foul play and he fights with Geraldine about how best to commemorate his father. Anousha searches for people involved with Josh's case.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 16
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Und - Individual Rivalries
programme.desc: There were many great team rivalries on the field during the 1990s, but there were many more fierce individual clashes that produced legendary battles and spectacular on-field theatre.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Australia's Egyptian Mystery
programme.desc: Marc Fennell travels to the Pyramids of Giza, down the Nile and to the very heart of the British Empire to uncover the truth of how the ancient Egyptian mummified remains of a child ended up in Australia's oldest university.

programme.title: First Weapons - Amerr
programme.desc: Host Phil Breslin observes senior weapon makers as they craft the Amerr. Experts reveal the scientific principles, followed by a challenge of speed and skill highlighting how the weapon was once one of the fastest on earth.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin - Episode 3
programme.desc: Jay struggles with findings about Jack's death. He looks for clues pointing to foul play and he fights with Geraldine about how best to commemorate his father. Anousha searches for people involved with Josh's case.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Episode 13
programme.desc: The National Press Club hosts public debates and discussions that shape Australia now and into the future. Home to national conversations with decision-makers and influencers; driving the national debate forward.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 16
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Episode 3
programme.desc: Featuring ceramists, street artists, fashion designers, architects, furniture makers, weavers and more; this series explores universal appeal of 'good design' across Asia. Hosted by Australian design expert, Anthony Burke.

programme.title: I Was Actually There - Nicky Winmar's Stand Against Racism
programme.desc: It's a day etched into Australian sporting folklore for all the wrong reasons. A moment on a footy field where Nicky Winmar, a proud Noongar man, called out racism.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 18
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Fauziah Ibrahim and Dan Bourchier, plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Insiders - 90 minute Election Special
programme.desc: Start your Sunday morning with the show the politicians rely on to find out what's going on. David Speers presents Australia's must-watch political program, joined by a panel of the best political analysts and commentators.

programme.title: Offsiders - Magic Round Special
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sportswriters, commentators and athletes examine the big issues and major results in sport. Offsiders unpacks all the action, both on and off the field.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 11
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch - Episode 13
programme.desc: James Glenday, Bridget Brennan, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who have appeared on News Breakfast. Plus our film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 36
programme.desc: The latest from ABC News on the weekend, bringing you the day's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 16
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 1
programme.desc: It's season 2 and Derek still can't cook! With locally found ingredients, and a sprinkle of culture and character, Mark and Derek create an Indigenous-inspired feast for the people they visit along their journey.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali - Episode 7
programme.desc: Lauren explores the culinary possibilities of the humble potato. She demonstrates how to make perfect crispy potato wedges, a hearty potato and vegetable curry, plus homemade gnocchi recipe that is hard to beat.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Episode 3
programme.desc: Featuring ceramists, street artists, fashion designers, architects, furniture makers, weavers and more; this series explores universal appeal of 'good design' across Asia. Hosted by Australian design expert, Anthony Burke.

programme.title: I Was Actually There - Nicky Winmar's Stand Against Racism
programme.desc: It's a day etched into Australian sporting folklore for all the wrong reasons. A moment on a footy field where Nicky Winmar, a proud Noongar man, called out racism.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 8 - Hawthorn v Richmond
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A typical married couple a little bored with their relationship come to discover that they are enemy assassins hired to kill each other.

programme.title: The Ghost And The Darkness
programme.desc: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

programme.title: Days Of Thunder
programme.desc: A hotshot stock car racer finds more than fame in the south - love for a neurosurgeon who has a marked disdain for racing.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after an eerie accident in which they believe they may have hit a young girl with their car.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: Lara Croft (Jolie) is back in action and faces her most perilous mission: to recover what ancient civilization believed to be the essence of all evil, Pandora's Box.

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: A heart breaking coming-of-age story about a boy's abusive relationship with his new stepfather, and his emotionally scarred mother.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Mr. and Mrs. Fox live an idyllic home life but after twelve years of quiet domesticity, the bucolic existence proves too much for Mr. Fox's wild animal instincts. Director Wes Anderson's adaptation of a beloved children's novel by Roald Dahl.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: The story concerns a squad of U.S. Army soldiers on a perilous assignment behind enemy lines. The mission: to risk their lives to save the life of one man, paratrooper James Ryan. Ryan is the last survivor of a family of four brothers, the rest of whom have been killed in action.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before it's too late?

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.desc: Police race across three states to catch a bus carrying an alleged gunman threatening to kill everyone onboard. On the coast of Florida, a toddler fights for her life after being found face down in a pool.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Jim has been a collector from a very young age but some of the tragedies in his life have compounded Jim's hoarding behavior.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Chilling accounts of children in danger and the people who fought to protect them. Stories of children who experienced the unthinkable: six girls hunted and murdered in their neighbourhoods; and more.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A career criminal and first-time arrestee bond in custody; an expecting father faces the prospect of missing his child's birth, and a 20-year-old aspiring model gets a taste of the inside of a jail cell.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A fugitive shows up to the courthouse but changes his mind and flees from officers; an assault victim confronts her attacker in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An accused murderer escapes from the courthouse; a teenager goes on trial for robbing a 9-year-old selling Girl Scout cookies; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A man leads police on a high-speed chase in a stolen mail truck. A restaurant owner is arrested after hiding drugs in a takeout box. A pizza delivery guy helps the cops arrest a thief; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A man decides to interrupt his crime to make a pizza; police track down a man who jumped through the roof of a port-a-potty; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: After a 14-year-old boy is shot to death outside of a friend's house, detectives wonder if he was caught in the middle of a sinister plot.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest

programme.title: My Strange Arrest

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jérôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Prévoir L'Imprévisible
programme.desc: Society is slowly but surely coming to an end. At least, this is what collapsologists, people who believe in the theory of global and systemic collapse, are predicting. What is the situation in Canada? We meet some of them who are leaving cities, engaging in activism, cultivating their gardens...

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Pissarro-Pontoise Art and History Museum displays the impressionist master's works. Mathieu Bassée and the team at Studio MTX are inspired by materials to embroider space. Miu Miu mixes genders and breaks codes. Sculptor and jewellery designer Chloé Valorso creates dreamlike objects inspired by animals, plants and minerals.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Suisse En Scène
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Musiques En Fête Aux Chorégies D'Orange 2024
programme.desc: This year Puccini is in the spotlight, but also, given the Paris 2024 games, the Olympics, with several works composed especially for the occasion. Heading the Orchestre National Montpellier Occitanie, the conductors Luciano Acocella and Didier Benetti will be sharing the stage with Ariane Matiakh and Yvan Cassar.

programme.title: Dj Battle Africa - La Finale
programme.desc: The second battle features the Burundian DJ Alida, the only woman in the competition, against the Algerian DJ Scream.

programme.title: Meurtres À Montauban
programme.desc: The traditional Montauban festival takes a sudden tragic turn: a former rugby champion is shot in the eye, like Duke of Mayenne four centuries before. Delacroix is tasked with the investigation and chooses Laborie as partner, a native from the region who knows everything about the complex world of rugby.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Jura, Entre Lacs Et Forêts
programme.desc: The Jura Massif forms a natural frontier between France and Switzerland. As season follows season, the mountains reveal the endless diversity of their wild open spaces, lifestyles, traditions and know-how. A journey through the valleys, plateaux, forests and lakes to explore a surprising land and its terroir.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S

programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The body of a young man is found in a freezer. Tenant with a rent-free room in an elderly lady's home, he was viewed as a parasite by the owner's nephews, who suspected him of abusing their aunt's trust. Had they decided it was time to get rid of him?

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The investigation reveals that most of those who gravitated around the elderly lady also had plenty of reasons to detest her. But discovering murderer's modus operandi reshuffles all previously held theories and exposes another, much more terrifying, reality...

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Rabbit and Tortoise take part in the 400 metres hurdles. When Tortoise takes a fall during the race, Rabbit decides to be supportive and help her opponent across the finishing line.

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy, Les Infos Noisettes
programme.desc: How do bees make honey? What do mushrooms do at the foot of trees? Why is there always water running in the river? Edmond and Lucy try to discover the fascinating world around them thanks to Edouard and his encyclopaedia.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Vic takes a career aptitude test at school and is disturbed by the result: undertaker! As she tries to mould herself to fit the job she finally realises that Cindy has falsified the results.

programme.title: Ernest Et Célestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Célestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires

programme.desc: Humour with spikes on! Phony reports, high-jacked programmes, pretend live broadcasts, mock celebrity interviews, fake adverts, street interviews... programme.desc: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

programme.desc: Jasper’s summer camp girlfriend comes to town staying with Charlotte. She quickly becomes jealous thinking Charlotte is in love with Jasper. Charlotte begins to question the girl's sanity.

programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show.
